requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: All Type
  • Additional Notes: Recommend 16:9 Resolution For Example:1920*1080

  • Sound Card: All Type
